description.value:
Your grafted arm has modular configurations, allowing you to swap between various different possibilities with ease in order to adapt to various situations in combat. Your grafted arm attack gains the modular trait, as well as one of the following configurations of your choice. A manually controlled grafted arm that is a ranged weapon increases its damage and fatal die type by one size, as usual.

Ranged

  • Arm Cannon 1d6 bludgeoning damage; capacity 3, usage 1, reload 1, concussive, fatal d10, and shove; 80 foot range increment

  • Gatling Grafted Arm 1d4 bludgeoning damage; capacity 8, usage 1, reload 3, automatic, fatal d8; 60 foot range increment

  • Scattergun 1d6 piercing damage; capacity 1, usage 1, reload 1, concussive, scatter 10 ft

Melee

  • Chainsaw 1d8 slashing damage; melee, fatal 1d10

  • Extendable Baton 1d4 bludgeoning damage; finesse, reach

When you use an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to switch configurations using the modular trait, you switch between the initial configuration of grafted arm you chose with the way of the grafted gun and the new configuration you chose with modular graft.

Special You can select this feat multiple times. Each time, you can choose another configuration and add it to the list of options you can choose when you use an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to reconfigure your grafted arm.
